seo.h1_heading: Google Ads for Service Businesses: Dominate Local Search & Capture Ready-to-Buy Leads

hero.headline: Get the Google Guaranteed Badge. Dominate Local Search. Book More Jobs.
hero.subheadline: Google Partner certified PPC management for service businesses. Local Service Ads + Search Ads = Maximum visibility and 5-10x return on ad spend.

cta_primary.text: Get Your Free Google Ads Audit

intro.paragraph: When someone searches for 'emergency plumber near me' or 'AC repair' at 2 AM, they're ready to hire someone RIGHT NOW. These are the most valuable leads in your industry—high-intent customers with urgent needs and open wallets. The problem? Most service businesses waste 76% of their Google Ads budget on poorly managed campaigns. With the average cost per click at $2.32 and rising, mistakes add up fast. That's why working with a Google Partner certified agency matters. We specialize exclusively in Google Ads for service businesses—HVAC, plumbing, electrical, legal, medical, and home services. Our dual approach combines Local Service Ads (with the Google Guaranteed badge) and optimized Search Ads to dominate local search results. We've managed $5M+ in ad spend for service businesses and generated over 15,000 qualified leads. Our campaigns deliver 5-10x return on ad spend with cost per lead ranging from $30-$100 depending on industry and market. With daily campaign monitoring, Quality Score optimization for 20-40% cost reduction, and our 90-day performance guarantee, you get measurable results fast. We handle everything: Google screening for LSAs, keyword research, ad creation, bid management, landing page optimization, conversion tracking, and transparent monthly reporting. Stop competing on price. Start dominating search results with the Google Guaranteed badge and expert PPC management.

faq.question: How does Google Ads for Service Businesses work?
faq.answer: Google Ads for Service Businesses uses advanced technology to automate and optimize your sales and marketing processes for maximum efficiency and results.

faq.question: How much does it cost?
faq.answer: Packages start at $97 per month. Most businesses see 3-5x ROI within 60 days making it a highly profitable investment.

faq.question: How quickly can I get started?
faq.answer: Most businesses are fully operational within 1-2 weeks from initial consultation to launch.

faq.question: Do you work with businesses in my industry?
faq.answer: Yes we specialize in HVAC Plumbing and Electrical as well as many other service-based industries.

faq.question: What kind of results can I expect?
faq.answer: Most businesses see 2-3x more leads 40-60 percent higher conversion rates and 3-5x ROI within the first 90 days.

faq.question: Is there a contract?
faq.answer: No long-term contracts required. Month-to-month service with 30-day cancellation notice.
